author: mariohavel
content:
The next Office Hours call will be focused on consensus layer again, because we will joined by <@308223150725005322> Prysmatic Labs! He is experienced full stack developer who might help you as a mentor if you contributed to Prysm or Beacon APIs. Get ready for his AMA on Tuesday: 
https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/issues/318
